article_text: Carolinas HealthCare sees its 2014 operating profit rise by 80 percent, after an early forecast that the hospital system would end the year in the red. Executives say a boom in patients and payments offset the challenges.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Carolinas HealthCare, CHS, Tarwater, profit, loss, hospital
article_metadata.title: Carolinas HealthCare says 2014 was profitable after bleak start | The Charlotte Observer

Carolinas HealthCare sees its 2014 operating profit rise by 80 percent, after an early forecast that the hospital system would end the year in the red.
